title: I have  been stuck in the loading screen for over 20 minutes now...
body: I don't know whats wrong, but I have been sitting in this loading screen since 4:22pm my time, it is now 4:43pm and I haven't seen a change at all. Im pinging the server now and I have 0 packet loss and 58ish ms apparently. Oh never mind the game ended. I really appreciate coming on after a week to not even get to play, and get a "leave" on my profile.

replies.body:
Most of the time, being unable to connect to a match after champ select is caused by an unstable connection to the server. I understand you pinged the server, but since pings generally only send 4 packets, it may not have provided enough data to determine the issue. I strongly recommend working through the steps outlined in our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a first step to resolving this.

Let me know if you have any questions.
